thread.title: Charming a Hotel in the Heart of Paris
thread.title_full: Charming a Hotel in the Heart of Paris - Review of Hotel Residence Foch, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Catherine B
title: Charming a Hotel in the Heart of Paris
text: This is a lovely small hotel in the centre of Paris. We stayed here ten years ago when we found the hotel perfect for a small family holiday. Returning with our twelVe year old daughter, the hotel was perfect for her first visit to Paris. It's location is excellent a ten minute walk to the Champs Elysee, five mins from a metro station and situated in a upmarket and very safe neighbourhood with shops and an excellent, reasonably priced restaurant (Del Papa) five mins away.The room was spacious and spotless and overlooked a pleasant courtyard. The staff were very professional but friendly and very helpful. The complimentary afternoon tea was a welcome treat after a long day sightseeing. Would definitely recommend and I am fussy.
